lead_paragraph: Kevin O’Dea joined the Jets as the special-teams coordinator after spending the past two seasons as Chicago’s assistant special-teams coach. He replaced Mike Westhoff, who stepped down to have surgery on his left leg.
snippet: Kevin O’Dea joined the Jets as the special-teams coordinator after spending the past two seasons as Chicago’s assistant special-teams coach. He replaced Mike Westhoff, who stepped down to have surgery on his left leg.
